id.description: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

other.description: The other patient resource that the link refers to. See http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Patient.

type.description: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource. Types are - replace | refer | seealso. See http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/link-type
